name: Super Snake! (Daniel Boghossian)
description:
Super Snake takes the classic Snake game and puts a small spin on it! Special foods with special powers, and of course the star of the show, the cucumber! Fight opposing snakes, become a ghost, and speed around the map while trying to achieve the high score!

Background:

This was a small project I worked on over my winter break to keep my Unity and C sharp skills trained, it was quite fun :) 

Music By: Sebastian Lechner
